thread.section_title: The Westin New York at Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Weekend in NYC
thread.title_full: Weekend in NYC - Review of The Westin New York at Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: R3534BSheatherp
title: Weekend in NYC
text: The service in this hotel was nothing short of amazing! Every Westin employee was welcoming, kind, and ready to make our weekend in NYC great. The room is basic, but the views are spectacular. The bed is comfortable, and the size of the room is larger than a typical NYC room. We will most definitely be returning.
